title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy will meet Trump Friday to finish a minerals deal
short_opening: KYIV, Ukraine, and WASHINGTON, D.C.  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says he will meet with President Trump on Friday to sign a preliminary deal giving the United States a share of critical raw materials but wants "guarantees of peace and security" in any final agreement.
